name: DuplicatingAliens
description:
Some aliens have crash landed on a strange planet ;(. Help them to repair their space ship by finding all the missing parts scatted throughout the forest. Eating the yellow mushrooms will cause you to duplicate.

  • WSAD to move.
  • Q and E to rotate the camera.
  • Mouse to aim and fire.
  • Hold shift to run.

LDGame.zip contains all the source code files.
